item.title: Genshin Impact: The Packages Returned Achievement Guide (Return Lost Packages and Letters)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Damaged Packages & Letters Locations In Genshin Impact Natlan
  • Optional Step: Michica Location In Genshin Impact
  • The Packages Returned Achievement In Genshin Impact

There are many courier services in Genshin Impact Teyvat. For example, players may know that the Inazuma youkai, Kirara, is a "Gold Level Courier" of the Komaniya Express. This courier service is a famous company that has already expanded its services beyond the Land of Thunder.

Similarly, players can find Courier's Longhouse in Natlan. Considering the people of Natlan can't freely leave the Nation of War, it's understandable that this delivery service is not known beyond the borders of Natlan. Despite its limited area of service, though, there seem to be a lot of mishaps happening still. For example, while exploring the Land of Pyro, players may come across some lost or damaged packages and letters. Thankfully, the item is intact enough to be returned to their respective senders. Bringing back these damaged packages and letters will reward players with The Packages Returned achievement in Genshin Impact .

Damaged Packages & Letters Locations In Genshin Impact Natlan

There are four lost and damaged packages and letters in Natlan. Here's how players can find them all.

Damaged Package Location

Go to the Teleport Waypoint near where players can trigger Tisoc's Ripe for Trouble quest in Genshin Impact . On the ground by the river is a Damaged Package .

Slightly Squashed Package Location

Use the Waypoint on the far east of the Stadium of the Sacred Flame, then walk west to find a Slightly Squashed Package between some wooden fence.

Damaged Letter Location

Teleport to Scions of the Canopy Statue of the Seven in Genshin Impact , then walk north to the water. There's a Damaged Letter on a rock by the river.

Torn Letter Location

Head to the Obsidian Codex Artifact domain and go east to get a Torn Letter near some alpacas. If players haven't yet, they can also follow the path southwest of the domain to reach an underground passage. There, collecting two Key to Somewhere in Genshin Impact allows players to face a difficult enemy, a Local Legend of Natlan.

Optional Step: Michica Location In Genshin Impact

This step is optional, but players can go to Michica to get info about whom each package belonged to. The courier manager can be found in the Scions of the Canopy tribe area.

The Packages Returned Achievement In Genshin Impact

To get The Packages Returned achievement in Genshin Impact , players must bring back all four packages and letters to the original sender. It doesn't matter if players reported the items to Michica first or not.

Imix Location In Genshin Impact - Slightly Squashed Package

Imix is the jeweler apprentice found in the Children of Echoes area in Genshin Impact . Give her the Slightly Squashed Package in return for three Iron Chunk.

Acat Location In Genshin Impact - Damaged Package

Go to the northern "underground" Waypoint of the Stadium of the Sacred Flame, then keep walking west until you find Acat. Give her the Damaged Package, and she'll reward you with three Candlecap Mushrooms.

Chanca Location In Genshin Impact - Damaged Letter

From Acat's location, keep walking forward (west) and go down the stairs. Chanca should be right by the stairway. She'll treat you with two Milk for giving her the Damaged Letter.

Tirda Location In Genshin Impact - Torn Letter

Finally, go to the People of the Springs area and reach Tirda to inform her about the Torn Letter. She'll give you three Embercore Flowers in Genshin Impact for your help.

item.title: Genshin Impact Players Praise HoYoverse for Important Change in 5.0
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Genshin Impact Version 5.0 raised World Level to 9, making enemies tougher and loot better.
  • Many fans have expressed appreciation for the increased challenge and rewards in the overworld.
  • Unlocking World Level 9 requires reaching Adventure Rank 58.

Genshin Impact fans seem to be happy about a new change to the World Level limit that arrived as part of update 5.0. Genshin Impact Version 5.0 also introduced three new playable characters: Mualani and Kachina in the first part of the update and Kinich, who is scheduled to appear in the second banner phase.

Genshin Impact usually adds tons of quality-of-life adjustments whenever a new major update arrives. As HoYoverse introduces tons of new content, it does not come as a surprise that certain important adjustments went unnoticed by many players, despite having a large impact on one of Genshin Impact's main assets: exploring the overworld.

One of the most important changes Genshin Impact Version 5.0 introduced is increasing the World Level limit to 9. Upgrading the World Level in Genshin Impact raises the levels of Normal Enemies, Elite Opponents, and Bosses by 10, significantly increasing the challenge and enhancing the rewards after beating them. A Reddit user named SuperAHDBatman expressed their gratitude for this change in a post that reached over 4k upvotes on the game's main subreddit. The Redditor, along with many fans in the comment section, claims that having enemies be much tougher in the overworld is refreshing. In fact, some of the enemies that can be found in World Level 9 Teyvat are on par with opponents from the Spiral Abyss, which is widely considered the hardest piece of end-game content in the game.

Genshin Impact Fans Are Excited About World Level 9

The post also pointed out that while certain changes, such as increasing the HP pool for certain monsters and buffing their damage output, might seem small, they have a huge impact on the overall exploration and overworld experience. A lot of fans have pointed out that the increased drop rates allow them to build up their characters much easier. To unlock World Level 9 in Genshin Impact , players need to reach Adventure Rank 58.

Some players even claim that they would not mind if HoYoverse introduced World Level 10 in the next couple of updates. In fact, a couple of comments stated that they don't even need a drop rate increase since they have most of their Genshin Impact characters maxed out and tons of ascension materials stored.

It's unlikely that HoYoverse will increase the world level in the coming months since the game's main focus will probably remain on the upcoming Natlan storyline and the new playable characters. The game has already revealed that one of the main villains of the Natlan arc will be Capitano, Genshin Impact 's First Fatui Harbinger.

item.title: The Sims 4: Best Pop Stars In The Gallery
item.description:
Pop is, as the name suggests, one of the most popular music genres in the world. Some of the most iconic artists and celebrities in the world came to be because of pop music. Even those who aren’t fans of the genre can’t deny the influence that it has had on the music industry.

It’s no surprise, then, that there are plenty of pop stars available to download in The Sims 4 gallery. Plenty of talented Simmers have tried their hand at recreating some of their favorite pop artists, and these are some of the best that players can add to their game.

10 Lady Gaga

Created by elip1306

  • Expansions: Seasons, Get Together
  • Game Packs: Outdoor Retreat, Dream Home Decorator
  • Stuff Packs: Tiny Living, Laundry Day, Vintage Glamour

Lady Gaga is one of the most influential pop stars in the world, and has also become a popular actress. It’s not surprising that there are tons of Sim versions of her in The Sims 4 gallery. Most of them are well-made, but this list's pick goes to this version from Simmer elip1306.

This Lady Gaga Sim has nailed her distinctive facial features and preferred makeup style. This look represents her more recent style, with long blonde hair and classic Hollywood starlet glamour. There are plenty of awesome picks for Lady Gaga in The Sims 4 , but make sure to check out this version for accuracy and simplicity.

9 Avril Lavigne

Created by Shimeon36

  • Expansions: Discover University, Get Famous, Seasons, Cats & Dogs, City Living, Get Together, Get To Work
  • Game Packs: Vampires
  • Stuff Packs: Laundry Day, Fitness, Luxury Party

The princess of pop punk, Avril Lavigne, also has plenty of recreations in The Sims 4 gallery. Some Simmers recreate her classic, younger look from the early 2000s, while others replicate her style as she got older.

This version from Shimeon36 does a little of both, combining her more mature facial features with a style akin to that of her younger self. The face has been amazingly recreated, and the makeup is perfectly chosen. Avril’s iconic black eyeshadow and eyeliner make her bright blue eyes pop, just like in real life.

8 Beyoncé

Created by Snapdragon27

  • Expansions: Get Famous, Seasons, Cats & Dogs, City Living, Get Together
  • Game Packs: Jungle Adventure, Vampires, Outdoor Retreat
  • Stuff Packs: Fitness, Vintage Glamour, Movie Hangout, Spooky Stuff, Perfect Patio, Luxury Party, and the free Holiday Celebration Pack.

Queen B has plenty of Sim replicas in the gallery, but this recreation by Snapdragon27 is a stand-out choice because of how well it replicates Beyoncé’s face. The nose shape, lips, cheekbones, and eyes are all stunning and finely crafted to be accurate to the superstar.

Snapdragon27 also got Beyoncé’s makeup on point. Her smoky eye shadow with a touch of sparkle and her deep red lipstick match some of Beyoncé’s most iconic looks. The choice of hair, jewelry, and the addition of a hat brings it all together to create a stylish and believable Beyoncé Sim.

7 Mariah Carey

Created by Darth_Geno

  • Expansions: Seasons, Cats & Dogs, Get To Work
  • Game Packs: Spa Day and Outdoor Retreat
  • Stuff Packs: Backyard, Cool Kitchen, Perfect Patio, Luxury Party

Simmer Darth_Geno has recreated famous pop and R&B singer Mariah Carey twice, but this version portrays her iconic festive look from her "All I Want For Christmas is You" music video. Darth_Geno replicates Mariah's all-in-one red suit as perfectly as they can with tools available in Create a Sim.

Not only that, but Mariah’s facial features are spot on, representing her younger self from 1994 in comparison to Darth_Geno's other recration, based on her more recent years. The accuracy and attention to detail here are fabulous, much like Carey herself.

6 Justin Bieber

Created by NiJaMa0522

  • Expansions: Snowy Escape, Eco Living, Discover University, Island Living, Get Famous, Seasons, City Living, Get To Work
  • Game Packs: Parenthood
  • Stuff Packs: Paranormal, Bowling Night, Luxury Party

Teenage heartthrob turned mature artist Justin Bieber is yet another pop star with tons of well-made and detailed replications in The Sims 4 gallery. This pick comes from Simmer NiJaMa0522, who has hit the nail on the head for both Bieber’s features and outfit choices.

The stand-out feature of this Justin Bieber Sim is the eyes, as there is a sincerity to them that captures Bieber’s expressions perfectly. NiJaMa0522 also got every other aspect of Bieber’s appearance right, such as his slight stubble, eyebrow shape, and chiseled jaw. The only thing that seems to be missing are his tattoos, though they might just be covered up by the long-sleeved shirt. The sporty clothes are also well suited to Bieber, who often wears track pants and beanie hats.

5 Dua Lipa

Created by Leanne62640

  • Expansions: Growing Together, High School Years, Snowy Escape, Discover University, Island Living, Get Together
  • Game Packs: Werewolves, My Wedding Stories, Dream Home Decorator, Spa Day, Outdoor Retreat
  • Stuff Packs: Laundry Day, Bowling Night, Vintage Glamour, Luxury Party
  • Kits: Moonlight Chic, Carnaval Streetwear

This British pop sensation has made a stir in the music world. Beginning her career in 2014 and jumping to the top of the charts in 2017, Dua Lipa has become an icon even with her short time in the spotlight.

There are plenty of Dua Lipa Sims in the gallery, but this version from simmer Leanne62640 makes the list thanks to how well-made her face is. Dua Lipa has a beautiful, distinctive face which can be tricky to recreate well in The Sims 4 . Any mistake can become apparent when trying to replicate a face like that, but Leanne62640 manages to get her features perfect.

4 Park Jimin

Created by lmgfio

  • Expansions: Discover University, Island Living, Seasons, Get Together, Get To Work
  • Game Packs: Vampires
  • Stuff Packs: Vintage Glamour

The South Korean boy band BTS has been making waves since their debut in 2013, and have since become global superstars. There are versions of each of the seven members in The Sims 4 gallery, as well as full households with the group. Among the best BTS Sims is this version of vocalist Park Jimin, made by Simmer lmgfio.

Jimin has a particularly striking appearance in real life, with a beautiful face and delicate features. Lmgfio has recreated these perfectly, from his plush lips to his almond-shaped eyes. The Sim also wears subtle makeup on his eyes, which suits him well and is accurate to Jimin’s makeup style in the real world.

3 Taylor Swift

Created by paulusion

  • Expansions: High School Years, Cottage Living, Snowy Escape, Discover University, Island Living, Cats & Dogs, Get Together
  • Game Packs: Werewolves, My Wedding Stories, Dream Home Decorator, Realm of Magic, StrangerVille, Jungle Adventure, Vampires
  • Stuff Packs: Moschino, Luxury Party
  • Kits: Simtimates Collection, Incheon Arrivals

It’s impossible not to include Taylor Swift, the reigning queen of pop, in a list of pop stars made in The Sims 4 . There are so many well-made versions of her in the gallery that it's difficult to pick one. However, this version of Taylor from Simmer paulusion is almost identical to the real Taylor and therefore wins a spot on this list.

Paulusion has recreated Taylor’s facial features excellently, choosing to include her blonde hairstyle with bangs from her recent years. The makeup, especially the red lipstick, is also expertly chosen. The only issue is that the Sim requires a ton of packs, but Swifties that have all the necessary packs are sure to enjoy this realistic version of her.

2 Miley Cyrus

Created by elodiejean

  • Expansions: Get Famous, Seasons, Cats & Dogs, City Living, Get Together
  • Game Packs: Vampires, Outdoor Retreat
  • Stuff Packs: Laundry Day, Fitness, Bowling Night, Cool Kitchen, Luxury Party

Ex-Disney star Miley Cyrus has made a name for herself as a musician in her own right, separating herself from the cheery and child-friendly Disney image she had to have in her Hannah Montana days. Her image has changed significantly over the years, so there are a lot of versions of her in The Sims 4 gallery that recreate certain eras. This one is a more modern take from her "Endless Summer Vacation" era.

Simmer elodiejean has recreated Miley Cyrus perfectly, with excellent detail that replicates her facial features. The piercing blue eyes and narrow nose are particularly impressive, as are the accessory choices that emphasize Miley’s vintage glamour vibes.

1 Michael Jackson

Created by koaleigh

  • Expansions: Eco Living
  • Game Packs: Werewolves

Last but not least is the King of Pop himself: the late, great Michael Jackson. Simmer koaleigh has recreated Jackson’s iconic look from the iconic "Thriller" music video. Not only is his face perfect, but his high school attire, complete with a vintage football jacket, mimics his look from the video.

Best of all, this Sim can transform into a werewolf, much like he does in the horror movie-themed music video. That does mean that players will need Werewolves game pack to get the full experience, but it is well worth it to have this Sim transforming when the moon is full.

item.title: Baldur's Gate 3: Astarion Leaves BG4's Character Design at a Fork in the Road
item.description:
Baldur's Gate 3 innovated within the established framework of Dungeons and Dragons by placing a significant emphasis on its characters, making its party of companions the focal point of the game. With a potential follow-up now on the horizon, ensuring that the next game's party members are equally distinctive will be essential to continuing this success. Baldur's Gate 3 's party especially stood out thanks to their unique mix of traits, but balancing these quirks with an accurate representation of the Forgotten Realms lore will be a challenge that the next game must navigate carefully.

While BG3 features a decent representation of various DnD races, it leans more into specific archetypes rather than the broad diversity typically seen in the greater lore. There may be no Dwarves or Dragonborn in the party, but characters like Astarion being a High Elf vampire, or Gale being a human Wizard embedded with Netherese magic, offer memorable twists on more average fantasy character formulas. These unique takes have opened the door for options far beyond the typical DnD fare, leaving Baldur's Gate 4 stuck with a choice of returning to more conventional characters or embracing even wilder picks in the future.

The Hybrid Nature of Characters like Astarion Provides Flexibility in Party Race Composition

Baldur's Gate 3's Innovation Shined Over Familiarity

The game's ability to blend familiar fantasy tropes with tragic and bizarre character backstories played a key part in many players forging strong connections between players and Baldur's Gate 3 's variety of companions. Previous BG titles experimented with the archetypes of some party members, but the cinematic presentation of the third entry took this to unprecedented heights. Not only does someone like Astarion have a firm place in the player's camp, but his character arc revolves around coming to terms with his vampiric heritage.

In the context of cut content, it appears that the party was originally intended to be even more diverse. Baldur's Gate 3 's cut Bard companion Helia would have been an elderly Halfling werewolf, adding some much-needed height variance to the party. Larian ultimately seems to have scaled back on quirkiness by excluding her, however, as there already exists a mix of a vampire and an interdimensional Githyanki in the content players ended up getting.

The Next Baldur's Gate's Party Has to Balance Tradition and Experimentation

Gimmicks Can't Overshadow Core Identity

The precedent set by characters like Astarion encourages the continuation of bold archetype blends in BG4 , and this could be one of the most effective ways to emphasize whatever the theme of that game will be. The style of BG3 shouldn't simply be imitated without a solid foundation justifying the presence of party member types that haven't had much spotlight in fantasy RPGs before, however, as this risks diluting the impact of a new cast. Hybrid or unconventional companions in Baldur's Gate 4 should be crafted with respect to them as more than just flashy additions meant to match the popularity of Astarion and Lae'zel, they need to serve the world in meaningful ways that don't undermine the emotional depth of the party as a whole.

Honoring the Source Material Before Delving Headfirst into Iteration

All the different DnD permutations that the next Baldur's Gate could explore in cinematic detail are an exciting prospect. However, it's equally important to keep the setting grounded by exploring characters and races that haven't yet had their time in the spotlight. The likes of gnomes and half-orcs deserve their own fleshing out as companions before a new narrative distracts from them with deeper-cut lore. If Baldur's Gate 4 is to honor its legacy, it should strive to balance its own sense of unique identity with the remaining areas of the core DnD mythos.

item.title: Five Nights at Freddy's Cosplay Brings Roxanne to Life
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • A life-like Roxy cosplay from Five Nights at Freddy's showed up Pax West.
  • The franchise includes 10 main games, spin-offs, and a 2023 movie adaptation.
  • Fans admired the Roxy cosplay and praised the detailed craftsmanship and performance.

Pax West, the four-day gaming culture event, has ended for another year, and horror fans were treated to a life-like cosplay of Roxanne Wolf (also known as Roxy) from Five Nights at Freddy’s during the festivities. An entertainment booth celebrating the Five Nights at Freddy’s franchise took place in Seattle, Washington, hosting a handful of on-brand activities, including an animatronic meet-and-greet, and showcasing the Secret of the Mimic demo.

Created by Scott Cawthon, the Five Nights at Freddy’s series includes 10 main games, multiple spin-offs, novels, and a 2023 movie adaptation. Into the Pit repurposes Five Nights at Freddy’s: Security Breach ’s open-world mechanics and is the latest entry in the franchise, with Secret of the Mimic to follow in 2025. Additionally, Security Breach is the title that hosts the antagonistic glamrock animatronic, Roxy.

Posted by TUMEFATTORE on Reddit, a 50-second clip from the Pax West festival showed a perfect cosplay of Roxy, parading around the Five Nights at Freddy’s entertainment booth hosted by Steel Wool Studios. Created by self-taught mechanical engineer daregularsauce (also known as Atreyu) and worn by caustic_cola, the impressive build captured all of Roxy’s details, down to the green stripe in her hair, and the material used had a realistic, animatronic shine. Most Five Nights at Freddy’s: Security Breach players want to decommission Roxy, but fans visiting the booth flocked to get their photo taken with the cosplayer, while Roxy posed alongside other animatronics of Freddy Fazbear and Glamrock Freddy.

Five Nights at Freddy's Roxy Cosplay Stuns Community

One Reddit user had nothing but praise for the cosplay's craft and performance, saying, “I don't know if I'm more jealous of the people getting to meet the cosplayer or the cosplayer themselves for having a literal perfect Roxy costume.” Another admirer on Reddit noted Atreyu was one of the best cosplay artists working today, highlighting the perfect, plastic fursuit. Additionally, several fans from the Five Nights at Freddy 's Reddit community wanted to hug the Roxy cosplayer immediately after watching the clip, and the creator’s exquisite work prompted the call for a Security Breach movie to be made. Furthermore, the community thought the Roxy cosplayer should have tracked down another performer playing the Five Nights at Freddy’s: Security Breach protagonist, Gregory, to fight.

Roxy is an animatronic wolf and egotistical keytar player from Security Breach , Help Wanted 2 , and Tales from the Pizzaplex book series, and is known to be a cruel and insulting adversary. Security Breach ’s Ruin DLC uncovered the tragic truth about Cassie, Roxy’s biggest fan, and aired the extent of the damage caused by Freddy Fazbear Entertainment, painting the once sadistic animatronic in a different light.
